1150050.name: Hide Or Die - Sledge Skin Pack
1150050.description:
NOTE:
The Sledge Hunter Character is automatically unlocked at Survivor Level 25.
You do not need to purchase this DLC to play as Sledge.

A man filled with pure rage; Sledge might just be the most heavy-weight, bone-crushing being that you could come across in Bale County. This DLC will grant you immediate access to the Sledge Hunter Character and the items listed below.

Includes:


  • Hunter Character - Sledge
  • Sledge Skin - Thor (with and without helmet variants)
  • Sledge Weapon Skin - Thor Mjölnir Hammer
  • Sledge Skin - Injured
  • Sledge Weapon Skin - Bloodied Hammer
  • Sledge Nametag Banners - 5x Sledge Nametag Banners
  • Survivor T-Shirt - Quick Witted
  • Survivor Hoodie - Fury
  • Immediate Access - Survivor Level 25 not required
1150050.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 土耳其语, 繁体中文, 韩语, 简体中文, 泰语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
